attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is said that " we need to pay a high salary to attract the best candidates" this is both in business and politics.
But how, why does this do this.
Its a fallacy, and a lie, it is meaningless, why should money attract greatness. It doesn't.
It simply attracts the greedy, the excess money lovers.
So by working for nothing, only the candidates with interest, desire, determination ie the best for the job, will be tempted to do it, and the ones who are money motivated who don't care will be kept away as they should be.
the recent expenses crime and debacle has utterly destroyed any residue of honour, crediblity and decency MP's had, reinstate it by introducing this measure, consitutionally, this IS within the governments and PM's remit, I have well researched it.

rejection.details: MPs pay is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
